name: I Have Crabs
description:
You have awakened in another world and must defend your crab colony! Though your powers are limited, you can manipulate your surroundings and ensure your colony's survival.

Controls

  • Move with WASD.
  • Left Click to Move a target.
  • Right Click to Rotate a target.

Features

  • Body Block Bullets! (They can't hurt you!)
  • New Crabs Spawn every 60 seconds.
  • Enemies spawn every 10 seconds.
  • Enemy Spawn Rate is increased by the multiplier (which also goes up every 10 seconds).
    • Note: I forgot to set the correct multiplier per tick from 0.01 to 0.05, so the game progress is a little slower than intended.
  • Upon losing your Crab Colony, the game will reset and record your last run's score at the bottom left.
  • Only 1 sound and you can only ever hear it once! (we didn't get around to adding audio, sorry!)
  • We're also aware that we forgot to anchor the left & right tips (sorry, again!).

This game was created for the Bullet Hell Jam.
